product_summary: Shadowing AI is an interview practice platform that provides continuous feedback. It uses AI to analyze your responses and give you personalized feedback on your delivery, content, and overall performance. Shadowing AI can help you improve your interviewing skills and increase your chances of getting hired.
product_pros: Personalized feedback on your delivery, content, and overall performance
Helps you improve your interviewing skills
Increases your chances of getting hired
Easy to use and accessible from anywhere
product_cons: Can be expensive for some users
Sometimes the feedback can be too general
Not all features are available in all languages
May not be suitable for all types of interviews
Some users have reported technical difficulties

product_usecases.details: You can use Shadowing AI to practice for specific interviews by uploading the job description and tailoring your practice to the specific requirements of the role.

Shadowing AI provides detailed feedback on your interviewing skills, including your delivery, content, and overall performance. This feedback can help you identify areas for improvement and develop your skills.
Practicing with Shadowing AI can help you build confidence in your interviewing skills. The more you practice, the more comfortable you will become with the interview process.
Shadowing AI can help you prepare for difficult interview questions by providing you with practice questions and feedback on your responses.
Shadowing AI has a community of professionals who can provide support and advice.

product_toolfor.details: Shadowing AI can help job seekers improve their interviewing skills and increase their chances of getting hired.
Career counselors can use Shadowing AI to help their clients prepare for interviews and develop their soft skills.
Recruiters can use Shadowing AI to screen candidates and identify the best candidates for their open positions.
Hiring managers can use Shadowing AI to conduct virtual interviews and get feedback on candidate performance.
Educators can use Shadowing AI to teach students about interviewing skills and help them prepare for the job market.

product_pricing: Shadowing AI offers a variety of pricing plans, starting at $19 per month. The most popular plan is the Professional plan, which costs $49 per month and includes unlimited practice sessions, personalized feedback, and access to the community of professionals.
